DOC.detailed_description: Participants study randomly assign personal feedback intervention ( PFI ) assessment 3 year . The PFI intervention deliver single session . Measures include NORC DSM Screen Problem Gambling ( NODS ) , South Oaks Gambling Screen ( SOGS ) , Gambling Quantity Perceived Norms , Perceived Injunctive Gambling Norms , Gambling Problems Index , gamble frequency , attitude beliefs gamble self-control , readiness change , gamble expectancy , gamble motif , gamble risk perception , psychiatric symptom , assertiveness , cop skill , substance use , alcohol-related problem , self-determination , social desirability .
DOC.criteria: College student South Oaks Gambling Screen ( SOGS ) score great 3 None , meet inclusion criterion
